main.description: Trying to change the world, one step at a time. Find out more below.
main.prevroles: President of UW Blueprint, Product Manager at Wish
main.bio: I am a young aspiring Software Engineer, with experience in full-stack development, machine learning, scripting, and automation. I am motivated by my passion for learning new technologies and perfecting my craft. I will never shy away from a challenge and I will always approach tasks with a positive attitude and a willingness to collaborate, explain, and take criticism to continue to improve.
main.contactmessage: To get in contact with me, reach out on LinkedIn or via email!

resume.skillmessage: Below is a quick summary of my relevant skills.

education.description: Elected as Academic Class Rep every term. Cumulative GPA of 86%. Played intramural sports including soccer, basketball & volleyball.
98% grade 12 average. Cumulative average of 96%. Leader of Electric Car Club, Fed Prov, and the peer tutoring group.

work.title: Associate Product Manager Intern
work.description: Defining product vision for Wish's shipping label generation service and returns program. Led the launch of the shipping label generation service in the Merchant Dashboard and helped with the processing of special characters that may be found in labels generated around the world.
work.description2: Defining Merchant-side experience with Tax Compliance in Indonesia, Columbia, and Chile. Working on improving the Merchant's experience with Wish's return program.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Created scripts to query large scale data and automatically send emails to over 1000 customers a week. Created an organizational tool for performing bulk operations on Oculus and Portal orders. Lastly, implemented the first SHOP universe search bar in React to be used in bulk processing tool.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Implemented achievement based system using React and Node.js which highlights key metrics of a user (including profile views, searches performed, RFIs created, etc) to encourage user engagement and drive activity. Improved registration flow logic to reduce sign-up time by 90% and customer support time by 50%.
work.description2: Assisting the sales agents through the creation of a security assessment dataset, saving ~10 hours of human time per week.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Designed an architectural proposal analyzing the structure and mapping of a new database format. Developed a database parser to extract models and relationships from SQLite using ETL principles. Lastly, created a nuget package that standardizes error and exception handling across parsers in C#.

work.title: Full Stack Engineering Intern
work.description: Saved 2.5 hours of daily computation time through tracking run seeders and migrations in MySQL. Reduced page load time by 80% through implementing analytic caching on key metrics and pages. Lastly, integrated Google Adwords for generation of customizable & large-scale ad campaigns in PHP.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed and trained a predictive neural network with TensorFlow that determines program failures based on file differences in exported data, operating at 95% accuracy and 90% recall.

leadership.title: Co-Founder
leadership.description: Co-Founded a technology startup focused on efficient and bias-free process management for application collection. Currently focused on the grant and community investment sector.

leadership.title: President
leadership.description: Led a 110-person student club that builds technology for social good. Responsibilities include setting the direction of the club, upholding club values and mission, managing day-to-day operations of the executive team, among others.

leadership.title: Project Lead
leadership.description: Led the design and development of a 3D interactive experience using Aframe, React, and Tornado. Responsibilities include managing the task board in Notion, running weekly standup & work sessions, and having 1:1s with developers and designers.
